text: The word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] which came unto Zephaniah [strongs id="h6846" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Cushi [strongs id="h3570" /], the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Gedaliah [strongs id="h1436" /], the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Amariah [strongs id="h0568" /], the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Hizkiah [strongs id="h2396" /], in the days [strongs id="h3117" /] of Josiah [strongs id="h2977" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Amon [strongs id="h0526" /], king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /].

I will utterly [strongs id="h0622" tvm="8800" /] consume [strongs id="h5486" tvm="8686" /] all [things] from off the land [strongs id="h6440" /] [strongs id="h0127" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

I will consume [strongs id="h5486" tvm="8686" /] man [strongs id="h0120" /] and beast [strongs id="h0929" /]; I will consume [strongs id="h5486" tvm="8686" /] the fowls [strongs id="h5775" /] of the heaven [strongs id="h8064" /], and the fishes [strongs id="h1709" /] of the sea [strongs id="h3220" /], and the stumblingblocks [strongs id="h4384" /] with the wicked [strongs id="h7563" /]; and I will cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8689" /] man [strongs id="h0120" /] from off [strongs id="h6440" /] the land [strongs id="h0127" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

I will also stretch out [strongs id="h5186" tvm="8804" /] mine hand [strongs id="h3027" /] upon Judah [strongs id="h3063" /], and upon all the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /]; and I will cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8689" /] the remnant [strongs id="h7605" /] of Baal [strongs id="h1168" /] from this place [strongs id="h4725" /], [and] the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of the Chemarims [strongs id="h3649" /] with the priests [strongs id="h3548" /];

And them that worship [strongs id="h7812" tvm="8693" /] the host [strongs id="h6635" /] of heaven [strongs id="h8064" /] upon the housetops [strongs id="h1406" /]; and them that worship [strongs id="h7812" tvm="8693" /] [and] that swear [strongs id="h7650" tvm="8737" /] by the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and that swear [strongs id="h7650" tvm="8737" /] by Malcham [strongs id="h4428" /];

And them that are turned back [strongs id="h5472" tvm="8737" /] from [strongs id="h0310" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; and [those] that have not sought [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8765" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], nor enquired [strongs id="h1875" tvm="8804" /] for him.

Hold thy peace [strongs id="h2013" tvm="8761" /] at the presence [strongs id="h6440" /] of the Lord [strongs id="h0136" /] GOD [strongs id="h3069" /]: for the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [is] at hand [strongs id="h7138" /]: for the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath prepared [strongs id="h3559" tvm="8689" /] a sacrifice [strongs id="h2077" /], he hath bid [strongs id="h6942" tvm="8689" /] his guests [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8803" /].

And it shall come to pass in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the LORD’S [strongs id="h3068" /] sacrifice [strongs id="h2077" /], that I will punish [strongs id="h6485" tvm="8804" /] the princes [strongs id="h8269" /], and the king’s [strongs id="h4428" /] children [strongs id="h1121" /], and all such as are clothed [strongs id="h3847" tvm="8802" /] with strange [strongs id="h5237" /] apparel [strongs id="h4403" /].

In the same day [strongs id="h3117" /] also will I punish [strongs id="h6485" tvm="8804" /] all those that leap [strongs id="h1801" tvm="8802" /] on the threshold [strongs id="h4670" /], which fill [strongs id="h4390" tvm="8764" /] their masters [strongs id="h0113" /]’ houses [strongs id="h1004" /] with violence [strongs id="h2555" /] and deceit [strongs id="h4820" /].

And it shall come to pass in that day [strongs id="h3117" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], [that there shall be] the noise [strongs id="h6963" /] of a cry [strongs id="h6818" /] from the fish [strongs id="h1709" /] gate [strongs id="h8179" /], and an howling [strongs id="h3215" /] from the second [strongs id="h4932" /], and a great [strongs id="h1419" /] crashing [strongs id="h7667" /] from the hills [strongs id="h1389" /].

Howl [strongs id="h3213" tvm="8685" /], ye inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Maktesh [strongs id="h4389" /], for all the merchant [strongs id="h3667" /] people [strongs id="h5971" /] are cut down [strongs id="h1820" tvm="8738" /]; all they that bear [strongs id="h5187" /] silver [strongs id="h3701" /] are cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8738" /].

And it shall come to pass at that time [strongs id="h6256" /], [that] I will search [strongs id="h2664" tvm="8762" /] Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /] with candles [strongs id="h5216" /], and punish [strongs id="h6485" tvm="8804" /] the men [strongs id="h0582" /] that are settled [strongs id="h7087" tvm="8802" /] on their lees [strongs id="h8105" /]: that say [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8802" /] in their heart [strongs id="h3824" /], The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] will not do good [strongs id="h3190" tvm="8686" /], neither will he do evil [strongs id="h7489" tvm="8686" /].

Therefore their goods [strongs id="h2428" /] shall become a booty [strongs id="h4933" /], and their houses [strongs id="h1004" /] a desolation [strongs id="h8077" /]: they shall also build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8804" /] houses [strongs id="h1004" /], but not inhabit [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8799" /] [them]; and they shall plant [strongs id="h5193" tvm="8804" /] vineyards [strongs id="h3754" /], but not drink [strongs id="h8354" tvm="8799" /] the wine [strongs id="h3196" /] thereof.

The great [strongs id="h1419" /] day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [is] near [strongs id="h7138" /], [it is] near [strongs id="h7138" /], and hasteth [strongs id="h4118" /] greatly [strongs id="h3966" /], [even] the voice [strongs id="h6963" /] of the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]: the mighty man [strongs id="h1368" /] shall cry [strongs id="h6873" tvm="8802" /] there bitterly [strongs id="h4751" /].

That day [strongs id="h3117" /] [is] a day [strongs id="h3117" /] of wrath [strongs id="h5678" /], a day [strongs id="h3117" /] of trouble [strongs id="h6869" /] and distress [strongs id="h4691" /], a day [strongs id="h3117" /] of wasteness [strongs id="h7722" /] and desolation [strongs id="h4875" /], a day [strongs id="h3117" /] of darkness [strongs id="h2822" /] and gloominess [strongs id="h0653" /], a day [strongs id="h3117" /] of clouds [strongs id="h6051" /] and thick darkness [strongs id="h6205" /],

A day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the trumpet [strongs id="h7782" /] and alarm [strongs id="h8643" /] against the fenced [strongs id="h1219" tvm="8803" /] cities [strongs id="h5892" /], and against the high [strongs id="h1364" /] towers [strongs id="h6438" /].

And I will bring distress [strongs id="h6887" tvm="8689" /] upon men [strongs id="h0120" /], that they shall walk [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /] like blind men [strongs id="h5787" /], because they have sinned [strongs id="h2398" tvm="8804" /] against the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]: and their blood [strongs id="h1818" /] shall be poured out [strongs id="h8210" tvm="8795" /] as dust [strongs id="h6083" /], and their flesh [strongs id="h3894" /] as the dung [strongs id="h1561" /].

Neither their silver [strongs id="h3701" /] nor their gold [strongs id="h2091" /] shall be able [strongs id="h3201" tvm="8799" /] to deliver [strongs id="h5337" tvm="8687" /] them in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the LORD’S [strongs id="h3068" /] wrath [strongs id="h5678" /]; but the whole land [strongs id="h0776" /] shall be devoured [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8735" /] by the fire [strongs id="h0784" /] of his jealousy [strongs id="h7068" /]: for he shall make [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] even a speedy [strongs id="h0926" tvm="8737" /] riddance [strongs id="h3617" /] of all them that dwell [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] in the land [strongs id="h0776" /].
Gather yourselves together [strongs id="h7197" tvm="8703" /], yea, gather together [strongs id="h7197" tvm="8798" /], O nation [strongs id="h1471" /] not desired [strongs id="h3700" tvm="8737" /];

Before the decree [strongs id="h2706" /] bring forth [strongs id="h3205" tvm="8800" /], [before] the day [strongs id="h3117" /] pass [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8804" /] as the chaff [strongs id="h4671" /], before [strongs id="h3808" /] the fierce [strongs id="h2740" /] anger [strongs id="h0639" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] come [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] upon you, before the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the LORD’S [strongs id="h3068" /] anger [strongs id="h0639" /] come [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] upon you.

Seek [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8761" /] ye the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], all ye meek [strongs id="h6035" /] of the earth [strongs id="h0776" /], which have wrought [strongs id="h6466" tvm="8804" /] his judgment [strongs id="h4941" /]; seek [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8761" /] righteousness [strongs id="h6664" /], seek [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8761" /] meekness [strongs id="h6038" /]: it may be [strongs id="h0194" /] ye shall be hid [strongs id="h5641" tvm="8735" /] in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the LORD’S [strongs id="h3068" /] anger [strongs id="h0639" /].

For Gaza [strongs id="h5804" /] shall be forsaken [strongs id="h5800" tvm="8803" /], and Ashkelon [strongs id="h0831" /] a desolation [strongs id="h8077" /]: they shall drive out [strongs id="h1644" tvm="8762" /] Ashdod [strongs id="h0795" /] at the noon day [strongs id="h6672" /], and Ekron [strongs id="h6138" /] shall be rooted up [strongs id="h6131" tvm="8735" /].

Woe [strongs id="h1945" /] unto the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of the sea [strongs id="h3220" /] coast [strongs id="h2256" /], the nation [strongs id="h1471" /] of the Cherethites [strongs id="h3774" /]! the word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [is] against you; O Canaan [strongs id="h3667" /], the land [strongs id="h0776" /] of the Philistines [strongs id="h6430" /], I will even destroy [strongs id="h0006" tvm="8689" /] thee, that there shall be no inhabitant [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /].

And the sea [strongs id="h3220" /] coast [strongs id="h2256" /] shall be dwellings [strongs id="h5116" /] [and] cottages [strongs id="h3741" /] for shepherds [strongs id="h7462" tvm="8802" /], and folds [strongs id="h1448" /] for flocks [strongs id="h6629" /].

And the coast [strongs id="h2256" /] shall be for the remnant [strongs id="h7611" /] of the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /]; they shall feed [strongs id="h7462" tvm="8799" /] thereupon: in the houses [strongs id="h1004" /] of Ashkelon [strongs id="h0831" /] shall they lie down [strongs id="h7257" tvm="8799" /] in the evening [strongs id="h6153" /]: for the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] their God [strongs id="h0430" /] shall visit [strongs id="h6485" tvm="8799" /] them, and turn away [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8804" /] their captivity [strongs id="h7622" tvm="8675" /] [strongs id="h7622" /].

I have heard [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8804" /] the reproach [strongs id="h2781" /] of Moab [strongs id="h4124" /], and the revilings [strongs id="h1421" /] of the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Ammon [strongs id="h5983" /], whereby they have reproached [strongs id="h2778" tvm="8765" /] my people [strongs id="h5971" /], and magnified [strongs id="h1431" tvm="8686" /] [themselves] against their border [strongs id="h1366" /].

Therefore [as] I live [strongs id="h2416" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /], the God [strongs id="h0430" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], Surely Moab [strongs id="h4124" /] shall be as Sodom [strongs id="h5467" /], and the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Ammon [strongs id="h5983" /] as Gomorrah [strongs id="h6017" /], [even] the breeding [strongs id="h4476" /] of nettles [strongs id="h2738" /], and saltpits [strongs id="h4379" /] [strongs id="h4417" /], and a perpetual [strongs id="h5704" /] [strongs id="h5769" /] desolation [strongs id="h8077" /]: the residue [strongs id="h7611" /] of my people [strongs id="h5971" /] shall spoil [strongs id="h0962" tvm="8799" /] them, and the remnant [strongs id="h3499" /] of my people [strongs id="h1471" /] shall possess [strongs id="h5157" tvm="8799" /] them.

This shall they have for their pride [strongs id="h1347" /], because they have reproached [strongs id="h2778" tvm="8765" /] and magnified [strongs id="h1431" tvm="8686" /] [themselves] against the people [strongs id="h5971" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].

The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [will be] terrible [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8737" /] unto them: for he will famish [strongs id="h7329" tvm="8804" /] all the gods [strongs id="h0430" /] of the earth [strongs id="h0776" /]; and [men] shall worship [strongs id="h7812" tvm="8691" /] him, every one [strongs id="h0376" /] from his place [strongs id="h4725" /], [even] all the isles [strongs id="h0339" /] of the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /].
Ye Ethiopians [strongs id="h3569" /] also, ye [strongs id="h1992" /] [shall be] slain [strongs id="h2491" /] by my sword [strongs id="h2719" /].

And he will stretch out [strongs id="h5186" tvm="8799" /] his hand [strongs id="h3027" /] against the north [strongs id="h6828" /], and destroy [strongs id="h0006" tvm="8762" /] Assyria [strongs id="h0804" /]; and will make [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8799" /] Nineveh [strongs id="h5210" /] a desolation [strongs id="h8077" /], [and] dry [strongs id="h6723" /] like a wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /].

And flocks [strongs id="h5739" /] shall lie down [strongs id="h7257" tvm="8804" /] in the midst [strongs id="h8432" /] of her, all the beasts [strongs id="h2416" /] of the nations [strongs id="h1471" /]: both the cormorant [strongs id="h6893" /] and the bittern [strongs id="h7090" /] shall lodge [strongs id="h3885" tvm="8799" /] in the upper lintels [strongs id="h3730" /] of it; [their] voice [strongs id="h6963" /] shall sing [strongs id="h7891" tvm="8787" /] in the windows [strongs id="h2474" /]; desolation [strongs id="h2721" /] [shall be] in the thresholds [strongs id="h5592" /]: for he shall uncover [strongs id="h6168" tvm="8765" /] the cedar work [strongs id="h0731" /].

This [is] the rejoicing [strongs id="h5947" /] city [strongs id="h5892" /] that dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] carelessly [strongs id="h0983" /], that said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8802" /] in her heart [strongs id="h3824" /], I [am], and [there is] none beside [strongs id="h0657" /] me: how is she become a desolation [strongs id="h8047" /], a place for beasts [strongs id="h2416" /] to lie down in [strongs id="h4769" /]! every one that passeth by [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8802" /] her shall hiss [strongs id="h8319" tvm="8799" /], [and] wag [strongs id="h5128" tvm="8686" /] his hand [strongs id="h3027" /].

Woe [strongs id="h1945" /] to her that is filthy [strongs id="h4754" tvm="8802" /] and polluted [strongs id="h1351" tvm="8737" /], to the oppressing [strongs id="h3238" tvm="8802" /] city [strongs id="h5892" /]!

She obeyed [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8804" /] not the voice [strongs id="h6963" /]; she received [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8804" /] not correction [strongs id="h4148" /]; she trusted [strongs id="h0982" tvm="8804" /] not in the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; she drew not near [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8804" /] to her God [strongs id="h0430" /].

Her princes [strongs id="h8269" /] within [strongs id="h7130" /] her [are] roaring [strongs id="h7580" tvm="8802" /] lions [strongs id="h0738" /]; her judges [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8802" /] [are] evening [strongs id="h6153" /] wolves [strongs id="h2061" /]; they gnaw not the bones [strongs id="h1633" tvm="8804" /] till the morrow [strongs id="h1242" /].

Her prophets [strongs id="h5030" /] [are] light [strongs id="h6348" tvm="8802" /] [and] treacherous [strongs id="h0900" /] persons [strongs id="h0582" /]: her priests [strongs id="h3548" /] have polluted [strongs id="h2490" tvm="8765" /] the sanctuary [strongs id="h6944" /], they have done violence [strongs id="h2554" tvm="8804" /] to the law [strongs id="h8451" /].

The just [strongs id="h6662" /] LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [is] in the midst [strongs id="h7130" /] thereof; he will not do [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] iniquity [strongs id="h5766" /]: every [strongs id="h1242" /] morning [strongs id="h1242" /] doth he bring [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] his judgment [strongs id="h4941" /] to light [strongs id="h0216" /], he faileth [strongs id="h5737" tvm="8738" /] not; but the unjust [strongs id="h5767" /] knoweth [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8802" /] no shame [strongs id="h1322" /].

I have cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8689" /] the nations [strongs id="h1471" /]: their towers [strongs id="h6438" /] are desolate [strongs id="h8074" tvm="8738" /]; I made their streets [strongs id="h2351" /] waste [strongs id="h2717" tvm="8689" /], that none passeth by [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8802" /]: their cities [strongs id="h5892" /] are destroyed [strongs id="h6658" tvm="8738" /], so that there is no man [strongs id="h0376" /], that there is none inhabitant [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /].

I said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /], Surely thou wilt fear [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8799" /] me, thou wilt receive [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8799" /] instruction [strongs id="h4148" /]; so their dwelling [strongs id="h4583" /] should not be cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8735" /], howsoever [strongs id="h0834" /] [strongs id="h3605" /] I punished [strongs id="h6485" tvm="8804" /] them: but [strongs id="h0403" /] they rose early [strongs id="h7925" tvm="8689" /], [and] corrupted [strongs id="h7843" tvm="8689" /] all their doings [strongs id="h5949" /].

Therefore wait [strongs id="h2442" tvm="8761" /] ye upon me, saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], until the day [strongs id="h3117" /] that I rise up [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8800" /] to the prey [strongs id="h5706" /]: for my determination [strongs id="h4941" /] [is] to gather [strongs id="h0622" tvm="8800" /] the nations [strongs id="h1471" /], that I may assemble [strongs id="h6908" tvm="8800" /] the kingdoms [strongs id="h4467" /], to pour [strongs id="h8210" tvm="8800" /] upon them mine indignation [strongs id="h2195" /], [even] all my fierce [strongs id="h2740" /] anger [strongs id="h0639" /]: for all the earth [strongs id="h0776" /] shall be devoured [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8735" /] with the fire [strongs id="h0784" /] of my jealousy [strongs id="h7068" /].

For then will I turn [strongs id="h2015" tvm="8799" /] to the people [strongs id="h5971" /] a pure [strongs id="h1305" tvm="8803" /] language [strongs id="h8193" /], that they may all call [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8800" /] upon the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], to serve [strongs id="h5647" tvm="8800" /] him with one [strongs id="h0259" /] consent [strongs id="h7926" /].

From beyond [strongs id="h5676" /] the rivers [strongs id="h5104" /] of Ethiopia [strongs id="h3568" /] my suppliants [strongs id="h6282" /], [even] the daughter [strongs id="h1323" /] of my dispersed [strongs id="h6327" tvm="8803" /], shall bring [strongs id="h2986" tvm="8686" /] mine offering [strongs id="h4503" /].

In that day [strongs id="h3117" /] shalt thou not be ashamed [strongs id="h0954" tvm="8799" /] for all thy doings [strongs id="h5949" /], wherein thou hast transgressed [strongs id="h6586" tvm="8804" /] against me: for then I will take away [strongs id="h5493" tvm="8686" /] out of the midst [strongs id="h7130" /] of thee them that rejoice [strongs id="h5947" /] in thy pride [strongs id="h1346" /], and thou shalt no more [strongs id="h3254" tvm="8686" /] be haughty [strongs id="h1361" tvm="8800" /] because of my holy [strongs id="h6944" /] mountain [strongs id="h2022" /].
